Html: I'm writing a framework but using FW1CreateFactory function is making my .dll not a .NET valid DLL, how can I solve?

I think you need to change the source to use STL/CLR instead of the C++ standard library used now (not that many places)... and maybe also change how memory allocations are done, I haven't really used C++/CLI so I can't say exactly the steps required. I tried to compile the lib like that a couple of years ago but abandoned it as it (at that time) wasn't as easy as relinking.
Thank you, I'll download the source and I'll try to make modification! :D
